name: Citalopram 20mg
description:
Content Warning: Contains descriptions of emotional distress, hopelessness, and existential dread.

No matter how much you learn about opening a door, none of it will work until the door has a handle.

Citalopram 20mg is a short narrative experience about struggling with depression and resisting help despite yourself. This was my experience with depression. I hope it can serve as encouragement for those like my younger self.

This game costs the same as 28 tablets of a 20mg Citalopram prescription in Australia - my monthly dose.
